subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. players union is appealing Commissioner Roger Goodell’s decision not to reduce the season-long suspension of Titans cornerback Pacman Jones. The union said it appealed Goodell’s decision in a letter dated Nov. 8 — two days after Goodell notified Jones that he must serve out the suspension handed down in April.
